info about

CPU

cat /proc/cpuinfo

GPU

sudo lshw -C display

OS

uname -a

HDD (smart)

# instalace
sudo apt-get install smartmontools
# mapování /dev/sdX
sudo fdisk -l
# vypsat info
sudo smartctl --health /dev/sdX
# vše
sudo smartctl --all /dev/sdX

Testované HDD

Dell PowerEdge 860 Intel Xeon 3060 2.4GHZ DualCore 250GB
